Help! My E30 won't start

johnsmith
Dec 1, 2023

My 1988 E30 M3 won't start after sitting for a week. I hear the starter cranking but the engine won't fire.

I checked the fuel pump relay and it seems fine. Any ideas?

m3expert
Dec 1, 2023

I checked the fuel pump relay and it seems fine.

Have you checked if fuel is actually getting to the injectors? The fuel pump relay can test OK but still have intermittent issues.

Try this: Turn the key to ON (not start) and listen for the fuel pump priming sound. It should run for 2-3 seconds.

diyguy
Dec 1, 2023

Check these things in order:

  1. Spark - pull a plug and check for spark
  2. Fuel - check fuel pressure at the rail
  3. Air - make sure AFM is working
